tool_description: Identifies coverage gaps in existing network infrastructure and evaluates how proposed sites would address coverage deficiencies in the target area.

coverage_radius_km.description: Predicted coverage radius from RF Coverage Predictor

coverage_area_sq_km.description: Predicted coverage area from RF Coverage Predictor

population_density.description: Population density from Geographic Data Collector

analysis_radius_km.description: Analysis radius for gap detection in kilometers

error_messages: Invalid coverage parameters: Coverage radius and area must be positive numbers.
Invalid population density: Must be a non-negative number.
Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid analysis radius: Must be between 1 and 50 kilometers.
Coverage analysis failed: Unable to complete gap analysis with provided parameters.
usage: Provide coverage predictions from RF Coverage Predictor and geographic data. The tool identifies existing coverage gaps and evaluates improvement potential.

population_served.description: Additional population that would be served

gap_areas_covered.description: Number of coverage gap areas addressed

coverage_priority.description: Priority level: critical, high, medium, low
